title: Business Development Specialist
job_overview:
We're building the next Walmart-sized retailer ($790.09bn, to be precise). If being part of something that ambitious sounds like a good way to spend the next 5+ years, we have two entry-level openings waiting for you.

This is a role for people who love the hustle — reaching out, closing deals, and helping build a retail empire from the ground up.



What You'll Be Doing
Calling and emailing suppliers in the US and Europe to close product deals

Outbound outreach  lots of it

Following up on supplier conversations and tracking progress in our CRM

Supporting with operational tasks like account setups and logistics coordination



You Might Be a Fit If You:


Can work during US business hours
?
????Have advanced English proficiency, both written and especially spoken

Are extroverted, persistent, and action-oriented (agentic)

Have high stamina and don’t mind repetitive outreach

Are comfortable with Excel and basic CRM tools

Love winning and really hate losing
